name: FITNESS
description:
Are you FIT enough? Get the highest score by conquering the challenges of a glitchy old television set. Fit your shape into the holes in the scan-lines to gain points. Don't get distracted, it's harder than it looks!

Challenge High Scores both online and off in this fast paced arcade-style game!

Keyboard Controls:

Left and right arrows move your shape one space in their respective directions

Holding shift makes the left and right arrows move 2 spaces

The up arrow moves your shape to the far right

The down arrow moves your shape to the far left

Alternatively, you can use the numbers on your keyboard to move your shape

Use the space bar to change shapes

Press enter to pause

Gamepad Controls (Highly Recommended):

Use the left stick or the dpad to move your shape left and right by one space

Left and right bumpers move your shape two spaces

The left trigger moves your shape to the far left

The right trigger moves your shape to the far right

Press the A button (or X on a Playstation Controller) to change shapes

Press the B button (or O on a Playstation Controller) to pause
